title: Nick and Andy Go to the Drive-Thru - KFAF
description:
To get 15% off your first order, free shipping, and a 100% satisfaction guarantee, go to http://meundies.com/morning!

Visit http://expressvpn.com/MORNING to get an extra 3 months FREE on a one-year package.

Go to http://hellofresh.com/80morning and use code 80morning to get a total of $80 off, including free shipping, on your first box!

Nick and Andy celebrate National Drive-Thru day by going to Wendy's for some of spicy nuggs!

Time Codes:
00:00 - Intro
04:30 - Surgery Station
09:13 - Nick and Andy go to the Drive-Thru
17:59 - Ads
23:44 - Photoshop Challenge
33:55 - Ask Andy Anything

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
